1.1.name: wordpress/bigmailchimp
1.1.description:
The main purpose of BigMailChimp plugin is to enable the user to host their MailChimp capture forms on their own website without the need to write a single line of code. Moreover, you can display your capture forms as widgets or as standalone forms on individual posts. Simply create/modify your forms on MailChimp and the changes will take effect on your site instantly.

Form more information visit the plugin's page
